akn:section.akn:heading: Employees subject to employee conduct standards of Merit Personnel Act.

akn:content.akn:p: Except for those District government employees employed by agencies not subject to Chapter 6 of Title 1 [ยง 1-601.01 et seq.], District government employees who participate in the procurement process shall be subject to the provisions of subchapter XVIII of Chapter 6 of Title 1 [ยง 1-618.01 et seq.].
Participation in the procurement process shall include involvement, either directly or indirectly, in:
